path.style: fill: rgba(54, 169, 225, 1); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke: #009fe3; stroke-linejoin: round;
fill: rgba(54, 169, 225, 1); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke: #009fe3; stroke-linejoin: round;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: #1d1d1b; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #1d1d1b; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: none; stroke: #009fe3; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
fill: none; stroke: #009fe3; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;

text.style: fill: #1d1d1b; font-family: Bahnschrift, Bahnschrift; font-size: 12px; font-variation-settings: 'wght' 400, 'wdth' 100;
fill: #1d1d1b; font-family: Bahnschrift, Bahnschrift; font-size: 12px; font-variation-settings: 'wght' 400, 'wdth' 100;
fill: #1d1d1b; font-family: Bahnschrift, Bahnschrift; font-size: 12px; font-variation-settings: 'wght' 400, 'wdth' 100;
fill: #1d1d1b; font-family: Bahnschrift, Bahnschrift; font-size: 12px; font-variation-settings: 'wght' 400, 'wdth' 100;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #1d1d1b; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: none; stroke: #1d1d1b; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: none; stroke: #1d1d1b; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
